t: Amazon will sell an exclusive brand of home health products called Choice, made by Arcadia Group
s: October 26, 2018 - A health brand consultancy called Arcadia Group has teamed up with Amazon to sell a new brand of consumer-focused medical devices, including blood pressure cuffs and glucose monitors, exclusively on the e-commerce giant's marketplace.

t: Amazon and One Medical agree to acquisition of One Medical
s: July 21, 2022 - One Medical is a human-centered, technology-powered U.S. primary care organization on a mission to make quality healthcare more affordable, accessible, and enjoyable through a seamless combination of in-person, digital, and virtual care services.
